member.name: P:Zelda.QuestCreator.Properties.Resources.Error_QuestNameMustBeSetForSave

member.name: P:Zelda.QuestCreator.Properties.Resources.Filter_QuestFiles
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Quest Data Files (*.zq)|*.zq.

member.name: P:Zelda.QuestCreator.Properties.Resources.Info_QuestXSavedSuccessfully
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Quest '{0}' has been saved successfully..

member.name: P:Zelda.QuestCreator.Properties.Resources.Title
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Quest Creator for TLoZ - Black Crown.

member.name: P:Zelda.QuestCreator.Properties.Resources.Tooltip_CompletedTextId
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The resource id that is used to receive the localized text that is shown when the quest has been completed. Should be in the format 'QC_X'..

member.name: P:Zelda.QuestCreator.Properties.Resources.Tooltip_DeliverLocation
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to The location the quest must be delivered at. Interpreted differently regarding the set Deliver Type.
Instant: This field can be left empty. NPC: This field must contain the name that uniquely identifies the NPC. .

member.name: P:Zelda.QuestCreator.Properties.Resources.Tooltip_DeliverType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to States how the player ends the quest..

member.name: P:Zelda.QuestCreator.Properties.Resources.Tooltip_DescriptionId
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The resource id that is used to receive the localized description of the quest. Should be in the format 'QD_X'..

member.name: P:Zelda.QuestCreator.Properties.Resources.Tooltip_IsRepeatable
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to States whether the quest can be done over and over again. After completing a repeatable quest it becomes available to be picked-up again..

member.name: P:Zelda.QuestCreator.Properties.Resources.Tooltip_IsStateHidden
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to States whether the quest's current state is hidden from the player..

member.name: P:Zelda.QuestCreator.Properties.Resources.Tooltip_Level
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The level of the quest. Quest difficulty can be induces by looking at the level of the quest compared to the level of the player..

member.name: P:Zelda.QuestCreator.Properties.Resources.Tooltip_Name
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The name that uniquely identifies the quest. Localization is done by looking up the resource string similiar to 'QN_X', where X is the name of the quest..

member.name: P:Zelda.QuestCreator.Properties.Resources.Tooltip_NotCompletedTextId
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The resource id that is used to receive the localized text that is shown when the quest has not been completed yet. Should be in the format 'QNC_X'..

member.name: P:Zelda.QuestCreator.Properties.Resources.Tooltip_StartTextId
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The resource id that is used to receive the localized start text of the quest. Should be in the format 'QS_X'..

member.name: P:Zelda.QuestCreator.Properties.Resources.Tooltip_Type
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The type of the quest..
